attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in Starmer and the labour party.
attributes.additional_details: We in in a downward spiral and Starmer/Labour are not the people to get us back on track, we desperately need a vote of no confidence before it gets any worse.
attributes.background: Get this country back on track, call general election to stop Starmer and Reeves doing any more damage than they already have before it's too late.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
